channel.title: [317]Need help with skilling, teleporting and godwars bosses.[317]
channel.description:
Question about skilling: -How do I add trees and mining ores? -How can I do so you get XXXX mony from a normal tree and XXXX mony from a oak tree? -How do I do so you get mony from mining on the mining things? -How do I make a farming spot? -How do I do so you get mony from firemaking, and the better tree you use the more mony you get? (XXXX = 1-10000000coins)
Question about teleporting: -Im just wonderign how I can fix new teleports or edit more teleports to an old with picture over/under the teleport?
Question about godwars bosses: -Where are the zamorak and armadyl bosses normaly standing? -How do I add so when u go down the cave it comes up the picture that is under this text and you just click on the name of the boss and you get to the boss? (The picture and idea thing is from the newest pkplanet client/source Link for the pkplanet source/client: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,433417.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,433417.0.html[/url]). [img]http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/5967/0017e.png[/img]
I rly need this so pls answer :D And remember that its to a 317 server.

item.title: [317]Need help with skilling, teleporting and godwars bosses.[317]

item.description:
@kokosal wrote:

@up
Ty, now i just need answer on the other questions

Read full topic
item.source: [317]Need help with skilling, teleporting and godwars bosses.[317]

item.title: [317]Need help with skilling, teleporting and godwars bosses.[317]
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

I can answer the part about changing GWD kills:
search in client.java:

20 kills

this should appear:

[} } if(objectID == 9975){ if(playerRights == 3) { Gwd(); } else if(saraKills > 19){ Gwd(); saraKills -= 19; sM("The Saradomin kills drain from you.."); } else sM("You need at least 20 kills to get in the cave."); }
Edit the "19"s to minus 1 of your killcount. Example:
you want your killcount to be: 30
make the 19 29
and simply edit the textâ€¦

Teleporting question: to edit those Pics under teleports, you would need to look in your sprites folder in your client for them. then change them. to edit teleports, go into clickmost.java and search the coords of the area u want to be changes, and change it.

Read full topic
item.source: [317]Need help with skilling, teleporting and godwars bosses.[317]

item.title: [317]Need help with skilling, teleporting and godwars bosses.[317]

@kokosal wrote:

Question about skilling:
-How do I add trees and mining ores?
-How can I do so you get XXXX mony from a normal tree and XXXX mony from a oak tree?
-How do I do so you get mony from mining on the mining things?
-How do I make a farming spot?
-How do I do so you get mony from firemaking, and the better tree you use the more mony you get? (XXXX = 1-10000000coins)

Question about teleporting:
-Im just wonderign how I can fix new teleports or edit more teleports to an old with picture over/under the teleport?

Question about godwars bosses:
-Where are the zamorak and armadyl bosses normaly standing?
-How do I add so when u go down the cave it comes up the picture that is under this text and you just click on the name of the boss and you get to the boss? (The picture and idea thing is from the newest pkplanet client/source Link for the pkplanet source/client: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,433417.0.html).

I rly need this so pls answer
And remember that its to a 317 server.
